author: rhuijben
msg: Fix a few more places that relied on svn_uri_*()s handling of relative
paths, by switching them to dirents and/or relpaths. Also fix a few related
svn_path_*() deprecation warnings by using the uri api.
Detect urls and choose svn_uri/dirent depending on that.
(resolve_relative_external_url): Detect url type and then choose the
right canonicalization. Don't rely on uncanonicalized to match
(store_locks_callback): Use dirent api for wc paths.
(organize_lock_targets): Detect url vs working copy cases and choose
(remote_propget): Use relpath api for in-repository path.
(svn_ra__assert_mergeinfo_capable_server): Urls don't have a local style.
(notify): Don't transform urls to local style.

author: rhuijben
msg: (svn_delta_path_driver): Allow driving the path driver over not-relpaths, to

author: julianfoad
msg: * CHANGES: Re-word a change and mention its issue number.

author: julianfoad
msg: Never use an APR hash's built-in iterator, as this is not thread-safe. Always
allocate it in a pool. This is a follow-up to r39869 and fixes the last
remaining instances in the core code. There are still some in swigutil_*.c.
(svn_hash__clear): Add a pool argument and use it for the hash iterator.
(path_is_subtree): Add a pool argument and use it for the hash iterator.

author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r39865, fix a logic error and merge_tests.py 76 with it.
